titleStmt.title: A proclamation, to all, of all sorts, high and low, rich and poore, wherein is proclaimed the law-royall, which is in keeping thereof is true liberty given forth by force and power for every one to observe, upon pain of death.
titleStmt.author: Covel, William.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: [illegible; Thomason copy cropped at bottom, affecting annotation].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
